channel.title: How to allow 50 people on your server with no lag
channel.description: Ok I am admin on a server "Progjex-scape.no-ip.org" and were lagging bc it can only handle 30 ppl on it or else it will lagg, so if you could please tell me code! thanks gurt

item.title: How to allow 50 people on your server with no lag
item.dc:creator: @The_Guardian The Guardian
item.description:
@The_Guardian wrote:

No, its your internet connection. Most likely your upload rate. Servers, even at 30 players at a time, throughout the day, will transfer about 3GB of data (saving player games, moving, etc). You can’t fix this unless you get a better host, or internet connection.

Read full topic
item.source: How to allow 50 people on your server with no lag
